verbose_text: Thrombin, factor Xa, and fibrin all stimulate the production of the proinflammatory cytokines IL-6 and IL-8, XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR and treatment with enoxaparin has been associated with a reduction in hs-CRP levels from baseline in patients with AF who underwent cardioversion.
evidence: Xa, and fibrin all stimulate the production of the proinflammatory cytokines IL-6
